EmailTemplate.description: New Mexico Email to Provider for Case Creation acknowledgement for email-to-case request for Network Roster Submission
EmailTemplate.name: BCBS New Mexico Provider Email2Case Network Roster
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of New Mexico Inquiry Received: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your recent submission to the Network roster email box.
This email is confirmation we have received your roster, case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
You will receive confirmation of the status of your roster within 30 business days of this receipt.
Please be advised, the Network roster email box is for roster submissions only. For questions or concerns regarding this roster case, please call 1-800-567-8540 or contact your Provider Relations Representative.To check the status of your case, please click on status checker.To check the status of your case, please click on status checker({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}).
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of New Mexico
Powered by: SalesforceTM
Blue Cross and Blue Shield of New Mexico, a Division of Health Care Service Corporation, a Mutual Legal Reserve Company, an Independent Licensee of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association.
Â© 2017 Health Care Service Corporation. All rights reserved.
(NOTE: Please do not remove the Ref id) Ref id {!Case.Thread_Id}
